quotes.quote: Tequila is not even a drink; it's a way for having the cops around without using a phone.
Love is like tequila shots, not the quantity but strength matters.
Take life with a grain of salt and a slice of lemon and a shot of tequila.
If you want to make some memories, add some tequila.
It was too much Tequila, or not quite enough.
And no one drank just one shot of tequila.
Deal with your wins and losses alike. With tequila, lemon and a pinch of salt.
If you want to keep your dignity intact, stay away from tequila.
Life is better with Tequila.
Tequila probably won't fix your problems, but it's worth a shot.
At least you do' need a prescription for tequila.
Tequila is like acid in a glass.
Drinking tequila is more about the journey than the destination.
One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.
When life gives you lemons, get tequila and salt.
Tequila is like Duck tape, it fixes damn nearly everything.
I am well aware I'm not everyone's cup of tea, I'd rather be someone's shot of tequila anyway!
We should all believe in something, and I believe it's time for another shot of tequila.
Tequila. Straight. There's a real polite drink. You keep drinking until you finally take one more and it just won't go down. Then you know you've reached your limit.

There were years when I was a beer and tequila guy, then I got real fat. And then I found that you could actually go on a diet and drink scotch. Then I got hooked on scotch, and if you get hooked on scotch, then everything else just tastes wrong.
An ounce of breast milk is even more potent than the finest tequila.
